patthana24.4:4.1: Nahetuṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:4.2: Nahetuṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:4.3: Nahetuṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo ca nahetu āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.4:5.1: Nanahetuṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.4:6.1: Nahetuṃ noāsavañca nanahetuṃ noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.4:7.1: Nahetuṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.4:8.1: Nanahetuṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:8.2: Nanahetuṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:8.3: Nanahetuṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu noāsavo ca nahetu noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.4:9.1: Nahetuṃ nanoāsavañca nanahetuṃ nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.4:10.1: Nahetuṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:10.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.4:11.1: Nahetuṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:12.1: Nanahetuṃ naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:13.1: Nahetuṃ naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:13.3: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana24.4:14.1: Nahetuṃ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:15.1: Nahetuṃ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:16.1: Nahetuṃ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:17.1: Nahetuṃ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:18.1: Nahetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.4:18.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.4:19.1: Nahetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
